data.text:
ARGAN BEDAYA jobs

About ARGAN BEDAYA

Company Industry: Real Estate

Company Location: Kuwait

ALARGAN is one of the leading developers in Kuwait, a pioneer in high quality residential and commercial development. Established in 1994 ALARGAN has acquired extensive knowledge of all property types from garden-style walk-ups to luxury high-rise buildings and commercial properties. ALARGAN has been successful because of the extensive experience of its management team, local knowledge of the marketplace, commitment to quality and service to its customers. As a result of its excellent track record and success, ALARGAN began to expand into other countries in 2003 and now has offices in Oman, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Kingdom of Bahrain, UAE, Lebanon, and just recently in 2006 in Egypt.

jobs Vacancies at ARGAN BEDAYA
